entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Chipewyan Airport 3:10 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -21.4°C
Wind: E 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
